mapper.select: select * from tb_room r join tb_roomType rt on r.roomType_id = rt.roomType_id join tb_street s on rt.street_id = s.street_id where room_id=#{room_id}

select count(*) from tb_room r join tb_tenant t on t.room_id = r.room_id join tb_roomType rt on r.roomType_id = rt.roomType_id join tb_street s on rt.street_id = s.street_id where 1=1
and room_name like CONCAT('%', #{room_name}, '%')
and street_name=#{street_name} and isRent=#{isRent} and DATE_FORMAT(contract_term_start, '%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m')-3
mapper.update: update tb_room set price=#{price}, roomDescription=#{roomDescription}, modifyUser=#{modifyUser}, modifyTime=#{modifyTime} where room_id=#{room_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_room where isRent='0'

select count(*) from tb_room where isRent='1'
